channel.title: _=How do I make my HAM server No-Ip and..~=_
channel.description:
I need a Tutorial on how to make my server No-Ip and a tutorial on how to change how many xp you get per time you hit the statue when you train.
Im running on satans isle. So, Yeah, Post if you know how to help or give me a link to a topic that has been posted already.
Thanks.

item.title: _=How do I make my HAM server No-Ip and..~=_
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

Since JBJr didn’t feel like helping… I’ll do what I can. Go to no-ip.com and register. Choose a random port and enter it in the port box. Then save that. then, you go to your router… http://(yourIP), Then everyones router is different so, I go to Applications and Gaming then it brings up a whole list of port forwarding lines… simply enter your desired port and enter the last 3 number of your IP (which is found by double clicking the connection icon at bottom of screen). Save changes then you can play… after you run the server of course…

Also, make sure your port is the same in your server.java file as the one you port forwarded and put into your no-ip thing.

Read full topic
item.source: _=How do I make my HAM server No-Ip and..~=_
